idea: Induscann Research private Limited is the only medical cannabis company in India to have a comprehensive exclusive license for R&D in the medical cannabis sector in India. The scope of its activities include cannabis cultivation, using the latest Canadian technologies, in the only legal cannabis growth farm in India. It is also doing research on cannabis strains and conducting clinical trials on cancer and epilepsy patients in leading hospitals in India.
name: Induscann Research Private Limited

idea: With rising food demand there is need for delivery boy service in industry. There are many people who are willing to enter this segment but because of 2 wheeler availability with them they are not able to enroll for same. With fuel price rising high and rental cost being high we are entering into segment with eBike and better renting rates to have economical  rates. This will enable us to target a growing segment of delivery boys
name: QUICKWHEEL DELIVERY SOLUTIONS LLP

idea:
edVantez is unparalleled distinctive, and the only organisation dedicated to educate, train, and mentor the entrepreneur in you. 

Mr. Nayan Bheda & Mr. Ashish Jhalani, two proficient and skillful experts on entrepreneurship and online business, founded edVantez with the vision to educate, train and mentor aspiring entrepreneurs & startups to develop their idea, prepare business models and attract startup capital. 

The edVantez team understands new innovations are continually emerging in the world of eCommerce so what you knew yesterday is different today! 

Hence, to keep you always on top & survive the changes, edVantez leads your way to educate and up skill the knowledge of online business and eCommerce, helping to build a better sustainable ecosystem anytime, anywhere.
name: CENTER OF ECOMMERCE EXCELLENCE PRIVATE LIMITED
